languages.text: "Как ты уродлив внутри, мон-кай... Нет, просто кровожадное чудовище, проклятье, насланное твоим народом на более просвещенные расы".
"How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."
languages.original_text: "Как ты уродлив внутри, мон-кай... Нет, просто кровожадное чудовище, проклятье, насланное твоим народом на более просвещенные расы".

traits.locale_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

languages.text: “你的内心是多么丑陋啊，猴子。你不过是头嗜血的怪物……是你的族群强加于高等文明的诅咒。”
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: “你的内心是多么丑陋啊，猴子。你不过是头嗜血的怪物……是你的族群强加于高等文明的诅咒。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Comme votre âme est hideuse, mon-keigh... Vous n'êtes qu'un monstre sanguinaire... Quand cesserez-vous donc d'infliger votre soif de sang aux races qui vous sont supérieures ? »
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: « Comme votre âme est hideuse, mon-keigh... Vous n'êtes qu'un monstre sanguinaire... Quand cesserez-vous donc d'infliger votre soif de sang aux races qui vous sont supérieures ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wie hässlich Ihr doch im Inneren seid, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nichts als ein blutrünstiges Monster ... Ein Fluch, mit dem Eure Spezies aufgeklärtere Völker belegt."
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: "Wie hässlich Ihr doch im Inneren seid, Chem-Pan-Sey. Nichts als ein blutrünstiges Monster ... Ein Fluch, mit dem Eure Spezies aufgeklärtere Völker belegt."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイ、あなたの内面はなんて醜いことか。血に飢えた獣でしかない…あなた方の種族が、より賢明な種族に与える呪い」
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイ、あなたの内面はなんて醜いことか。血に飢えた獣でしかない…あなた方の種族が、より賢明な種族に与える呪い」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Eres un horror por dentro, mon-keigh. Solo un bruto sanguinario... una maldición que vuestra raza dirige contra otras más ilustradas».
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: «Eres un horror por dentro, mon-keigh. Solo un bruto sanguinario... una maldición que vuestra raza dirige contra otras más ilustradas».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

languages.text: "İçin nasıl da çürümüş be mon-keigh. Kana susamış bir canavardan farksızsın. Halkının daha aydın ırklara musallat ettiği bir lanetsin."
languages.original_text: "How ugly you are on the inside, mon-keigh. Nothing but a bloodthirsty monster... A curse your people inflict upon more enlightened races."

traits.locale_text: "İçten içe ne kadar da çirkinsin mon-keigh... Kana susamış bir canavardan başka bir şey değilsin. Halkının daha aydın ırklara bir lanetisin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
